comments:
The problem occurs for me under Eclipse 3.1M3. With the identical workspace in
3.1M2, there were no problems. 

To reproduce: start with a clean workspace, and create or import any application
plugin. Run the plugin through menu item Run -> Run... (I used all the default
values, except that under the plugins tab, I selected only the plugins I
needed). Everything works fine. Next, use File -> Import..., select "External
Plugins and Fragments", use all the defaults on the next page, and then select
org.eclipse.osgi to be imported. Run the original plugin again. Now it fails
with the following exception:

!SESSION Tue Nov 09 18:58:07 EST 2004 ------------------------------------------
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.launcher 4 0 Nov 09, 2004 18:58:07.648
!MESSAGE Exception launching the Eclipse Platform:
!STACK
java.net.MalformedURLException: unknown protocol: c
	at java.net.URL.<init>(URL.java:574)
	at java.net.URL.<init>(URL.java:464)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.addDevEntries(Main.java:371)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.getDevPath(Main.java:284)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.getBootPath(Main.java:406)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.basicRun(Main.java:174)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.run(Main.java:704)
	at org.eclipse.core.launcher.Main.main(Main.java:688)

It appears that the launcher does not like the org.eclipse.osgi property that is
created in dev.properties. This seems to happen whether or not the imported
org.eclipse.osgi project is included in the list of plugins to launch.

Under 3.1M3, this is my dev.properties:

#
#Tue Nov 09 18:58:07 EST 2004
org.eclipse.osgi=C\:/m3test/plugins/org.eclipse.osgi_3.1.0/osgi.jar,C\:/m3test/plugins/org.eclipse.osgi_3.1.0/core.jar,C\:/m3test/plugins/org.eclipse.osgi_3.1.0/resolver.jar,C\:/m3test/plugins/org.eclipse.osgi_3.1.0/defaultAdaptor.jar,C\:/m3test/plugins/org.eclipse.osgi_3.1.0/eclipseAdaptor.jar,C\:/m3test/plugins/org.eclipse.osgi_3.1.0/console.jar
org.eclipse.ui.tutorials.rcp.part1=bin

In the case of 3.1M2 where it works, here is dev.properties:

#
#Tue Nov 09 19:10:46 EST 2004
org.eclipse.osgi=bin
org.eclipse.ui.tutorials.rcp.part1=bin
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 78078 ***
